Class Evaluator

java.lang.Object
  Evaluator

public class Evaluator
extends java.lang.Object

The Evaluator class is the main class that controls the Categories in the yahtzee game. It sums up the scores and asserts each category the scores calculatedaccording to the rules of the game.

Version:
11/10/2007
Author:
Kitty Jasika Miranda
